com.github.situx.postagger.main.gui.ime.descriptor

Interface GenericInputMethod.Control

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AkkInputTermSource.AkkadMethodControl, GenericInputMethodControl, TreeBuilder.AkkadianMethodControl
    Enclosing class:
    GenericInputMethod<V>

    public static interface GenericInputMethod.Control
    Defines control behaviors for the InputMethod. InputTermMethod implementations can return a custom implementation that has add additional controls.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getChooserOrientation()
      Get the orientation of the alternatives paging chooser that appears below-the-spot when choosing an alternative.
      java.awt.Font getFont()
      Get the font that this InputMethod is using in the components it displays in its below-the-spot windows (raw mode and alternates chooser).
      boolean isEnabled() 
      boolean isUsingRawWindow()
      Obtain whether the method should use a window below-the-spot for raw input (this window is separate from the Java Input Method Framework's below-the-spot handling of converted characters).
      void setChooserOrientation(boolean chooserOrientation)
      Set the orientation of the alternatives paging chooser that appears below-the-spot when choosing an aternative.
      void setEnabled(boolean enabled) 
      void setFont(java.awt.Font font)
      Set the font that this InputMethod is using in the components it displays in its below-the-spot windows (raw mode and alternates chooser).
      void setUsingRawWindow(boolean usingRawWindow)
      Set whether the method should use a separate window for raw input, or whether it should be composed inline with other converted but uncommitted text.

    • Method Detail

      • isUsingRawWindow

        boolean isUsingRawWindow()
        Obtain whether the method should use a window below-the-spot for raw input (this window is separate from the Java Input Method Framework's below-the-spot handling of converted characters). If false, raw input will be composed inline with converted but uncommitted text.
        Returns:
        true if using a raw window

      • setUsingRawWindow

        void setUsingRawWindow(boolean usingRawWindow)
        Set whether the method should use a separate window for raw input, or whether it should be composed inline with other converted but uncommitted text.
        Parameters:
        usingRawWindow -

      • getChooserOrientation

        boolean getChooserOrientation()
        Get the orientation of the alternatives paging chooser that appears below-the-spot when choosing an alternative.
        Returns:
        chooser orientation, true for vertical, false for horizontal

      • setChooserOrientation

        void setChooserOrientation(boolean chooserOrientation)
        Set the orientation of the alternatives paging chooser that appears below-the-spot when choosing an aternative.
        Parameters:
        chooserOrientation - true for vertical, false for horizontal

      • getFont

        java.awt.Font getFont()
        Get the font that this InputMethod is using in the components it displays in its below-the-spot windows (raw mode and alternates chooser).
        Returns:
        the font

      • setFont

        void setFont(java.awt.Font font)
        Set the font that this InputMethod is using in the components it displays in its below-the-spot windows (raw mode and alternates chooser).
        Parameters:
        font - the font

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the InputMethod is enabled, false if input passes through

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if the InputMethod is enabled, false if input passes through
